name: fekkas
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C. Crack the eggs into a bowl, add the sugar, vanilla sugar, and sunflower oil. Mix.
Add the baking powder, flour, sesame seeds, salt, and anise seeds. Mix until you get a very soft dough ball.
Add the chopped almonds and raisins.
Shape the dough into logs. Place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Brush with the beaten egg mixed with instant coffee. Make stripes with a fork.
Bake the logs for 20-25 minutes at 180°C to precook them (they should remain light in color).
Let them cool and refrigerate overnight.
The next day, slice the logs into thin biscuits using a sharp knife. Toast them in the oven (on both sides) until they are crispy. Store in airtight containers.
